question: Type your numerical response. What is the alignment score between 7WSM_1 and 6THA_1? Type 0 to reveal the answer and methods to find it

answers.feedback: 345. One solution looks like this: forth_record=record_glut[3]; glut_align=pairwise2.align.globalxx(first_record.seq, forth_record.seq); print(format_alignment(*glut_align[0]))
